commit.message:
re PR libgcj/21058 (fragile libgcj link process omits some inner classes)

	PR libgj/21058:
	* sources.am, Makefile.in: Rebuilt.
	* scripts/makemake.tcl (emit_bc_rule): Create a temporary list
	file.
	(emit_source_var): Don't emit patsubst with './'.

From-SVN: r102140

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,11 @@
+2005-07-18  Tom Tromey  <tromey@redhat.com>
+
+	PR libgj/21058:
+	* sources.am, Makefile.in: Rebuilt.
+	* scripts/makemake.tcl (emit_bc_rule): Create a temporary list
+	file.
+	(emit_source_var): Don't emit patsubst with './'.
+
 2005-07-18  Tom Tromey  <tromey@redhat.com>
 
 	* Makefile.in: Rebuilt.

@@ -785,15 +785,15 @@ SUFFIXES = .class .java .h .properties .list

-gnu_awt_header_files = $(patsubst ./%,%,$(patsubst %.java,%.h,$(gnu_awt_source_files)))
